name: AeroAce
description:
AeroAce is a young spaceman and lover of adventure. One day while out flying his spaceship, he takes a turn too close to an asteroid belt and totals his ship! The parts scatter to neighboring planets, leaving him stranded with nothing but his quick wit and spacesuit.

Help AeroAce collect the four missing parts of his spaceship and defeat the meddling aliens that stand in his way!

AeroAce and all of its art, music, and design were created by Hannah Pogue at the University of Central Florida.
